pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Gérald Larcher, Speaker of the Senate of France | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Gérard Larcher, Speaker of the Senate of the French Republic, who was accompanied by other senior senators.

The Prime Minister and the Speaker commended the close relations between Canada and France.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Speaker Larcher had a wide-ranging discussion including with regard to environmental cooperation. They discussed enhanced commercial relations between Canada and France including through implementation of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
